TopicTitle: Mod for changing from flight straight to the tracking station?

Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm looking for a mod that adds an option when you press escape. Right now, the options when you are flying a vessel are 

    Resume flightRevert flight (if applicable)Space Center Options

I'm looking for a lightweight mod (no extra buttons, toolbars etc if possible) that adds this option. 

    Resume flightRevert flight (if applicable)Space Center >>Tracking Station<<Settings

Does something like this exist? What are my alternatives? Cheers..C:
Don't see a mod for it. I want a shortcut to the tracking station from piloting my vessel so I can do quicker time warps.

[@DrPastah](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/78589-drpastah/) Yeah, I think the closest you'll find is the mod Gaiiden linked above... Its one of my Must-Have-Mods...
